name: ninja-app
description: Root package.json for Motoko backend + Vite/React frontend in ./frontend

scripts.build: sh -eu -c 'export npm_config_production=false; npm install --no-audit --no-fund; npx vite build --config ./vite.config.mjs'
scripts.dev: sh -eu -c 'export npm_config_production=false; npm install --no-audit --no-fund; npx vite --config ./vite.config.mjs'
scripts.preview: sh -eu -c 'export npm_config_production=false; npm install --no-audit --no-fund; npx vite preview --config ./vite.config.mjs'
